subject: Philosophy
title: What Is Existentialism?
description: A quick, practical guide to What Is Existentialism?.

hook.text: You didn't ask to be born. Yet here you are, responsible for every choice you make.

buildup.text: Existentialism is a philosophy built on one radical idea: existence precedes essence.

discovery.text: You aren't born with a fixed nature or purpose. You create yourself through your choices.

twist.text: That sounds liberating, but it's also terrifying. With no blueprint, every decision is entirely yours.

climax.text: Existentialism forces you to confront the weight of your own freedom â€” and take it seriously.

punchline.text: You are what you choose to be. No excuses.

quiz.question: What does 'existence precedes essence' mean?
options: You exist first and define yourself through choices
Your soul exists before your body
Essence is more important than existence
